channel.title: I little funny put not really =(
channel.description: ok i adding chaotic maul to my server and when i wear it it a spade but when it in my invy its the maul and when its on the gound??? any help ty!

item.title: I little funny put not really =(
item.dc:creator: @freedom522 freedom522
item.description:
@freedom522 wrote:

here’s the code for adding stuff into class 8. for weapons

if(i == 14303) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 14304; //Model Drop/inv view class8.anInt181 = 620; class8.anInt190 = 88; class8.anInt198 = 188; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 14303; //male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14303; //female wearing class8.anInt164 = -1; //Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1; //male arms/sleeves class8.anInt175 = 65; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Troy's Sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Troy's almighty sword!".getBytes(); }

as you can see i have the //male arms and stuff on there so you know what you need to change, for a weapon you need to change the male wearing and female wearing, then you need to add the correct drop model code also. then you need to go into your server type “add model ____ (model code)” compile restart. should work.

Read full topic
